attributes.action: Help the St Christopher’s hospice get the full £14 million from the NHS for their Patients & Carers!
attributes.additional_details: The St Christopher’s hospice is a charity that helps patients the people get better they only receive £5 million from the NHS and they have to raise the other £9 million from the supporters that help then earn the money. The Full £14 Million pays for the nurses, the food, Equipment, Doctors and all the other staff that helps then out. It costs per driver: £1,200 for the Syringe's Please Help gets this to the government.
